notes: Spacious, well-maintained modern apartment with recessed LED lighting, wood-accent TV wall, projector, polished tile floors in living area and wood flooring in bedroom. Large floor-to-ceiling sliding glass doors provide excellent natural light and access to a balcony, which is a baby safety concern requiring childproofing. The glass coffee table has sharp corners that would need padding. At 60 ping on 4F/7F, this is a generous family-sized unit in clean move-in condition, though the description is just an agent ad placeholder with no real listing details.
